thread.title: Cathriona White's Suicide Note Revealed, Jim Carrey to Fly to Ireland for Her Funeral
thread.title_full: Cathriona White's Suicide Note Revealed, Jim Carrey to Fly to Ireland for Her Funeral

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Cathriona White's Suicide Note Revealed, Jim Carrey to Fly to Ireland for Her Funeral
text:
Comments A source who claimed to have seen White's note revealed it partly read, 'Jim, I love you. Please forgive me. I'm not for this world.' 
Days after Cathriona White's alleged suicide, her heartbreaking suicide note was revealed. Radar Online reported that the late make-up artist made a painful plea to her on-off boyfriend Jim Carrey . A source who read White's suicide note was quoted as telling the outlet, the letter included the words, "Jim, I love you. Please forgive me. I'm not for this world." White, moreover, was said to have begged Carrey to "take care" of her burial and distribute her assets to her grieving family.Still according to the same source, Carrey has flown White's family from their homes in Ireland to L.A. in the wake of her sudden death on September 28. "Big-hearted Jim paid all their expenses and is dealing with all of her funeral arrangements," the source told Radar Online. Meanwhile, it has been reported that White's body would be taken to her grandfather's funeral home in Cappawhite, Tipperary on Friday evening, October 9. Her body would then be taken to the local parish church, Our Lady of Fatima Church. White is set to be buried the next day following Requiem Mass. Carrey is expected to fly to Ireland to attend the funeral. His bodyguard has been photographed packing the star's car in advance of his expected trip to the country.
